name: Beach on Acid
description: Well, I was quite sober when I shot these photographs. I was sober when I edited them too. The photo-manipulation and post-processing required a beer or two, but ultimately, the groove got me higher than you. Do you anticipate a trip to be wonderful in a way and it is horrible instead? The silver lining is when you realise, you gained much more than you thought, with the way things went in actuality. Imagine your dreams came true. The art is fiction, my feelings real, perhaps even surreal. What will become of me? | Digha, South Bengal, India | October 2021 | @ayushbanerjee
